creditline: Gift of Loren G. Lipson, M.D.
description: gourd at top with rattle; yellow horsehair tassel at top; beaded handle with image of blue and green hummingbird sitting on a branch under black to medium blue sky with stars at top; tassel at bottom with white twisted leather tassels and ovoid silver pendant with three cross-shaped stars and two dangles with faceted beads and beaded bands with stars against sky, and yellow horsehair tassels
medium: Deer leather, beads, sterling silver and other metals, horsehair, gourd, ebony wood
signed: on back of pendant, incised: KAREEN / MONTY CLAW / 2015 / 55
title: Morning Hummer rattle
